body_html:
I experienced the same issue. I got the same error:
RuntimeError: storages don't support slicing.

I believe this line is responsible: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/serialization.py#L513

Is there a quick fix to this issue?
body_text:
I experienced the same issue. I got the same error:
RuntimeError: storages don't support slicing.
I believe this line is responsible: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/serialization.py#L513
Is there a quick fix to this issue?
body:
I experienced the same issue. I got the same error:
`RuntimeError: storages don't support slicing`.

I believe this line is responsible: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/serialization.py#L513

Is there a quick fix to this issue?
